desc: Home page displays a feed with a variable amount of questions and options to sort by.
Features such as viewing questions and toggling dark mode are available to users before they log in.
Creating new questions requires log-in and then the process is straightforward and user-friendly.
Users profiles display that users information and links to their published questions and answers.
Users each have unique avatars generated by robohash.org and have the ability to edit their own profiles.
